LanguageData.Light_Streetlamp.label: outdoor lamp
LanguageData.Light_Streetlamp.description: A tall electrical lamp that lights an area, able to be placed outside without catching fire, making it ideal for road lighting and only turns on at night.
LanguageData.Misc_FileCabinet.label: file cabinet
LanguageData.Misc_FileCabinet.description: A piece of furniture used for organising documents and records in paper form. It will help you perform research taks faster.
LanguageData.Shelf_WeaponRack.label: weapon rack
LanguageData.Shelf_WeaponRack.description: A heavy duty rack for storing weaponry. Weapons stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Bin_Small.label: Small bin
LanguageData.Bin_Small.description: A small bin to help keeping the area around it somewhat clean. Slowly removes trash and filth in a 10 Cell radius.
LanguageData.Bin_Large.label: Large bin
LanguageData.Bin_Large.description: A large bin to help keeping the area around it clean. Slowly removes trash and filth in a 20 Cell radius.
